value.name: ProBook Elite 15
value.description: High-performance business laptop with 14th Gen Intel Core i7, perfect for professionals who need power and portability.
value.specs: Display: 15.6" FHD IPS | Processor: Intel Core i7-14700H | Memory: 16GB DDR5 | Storage: 512GB NVMe SSD | Graphics: Intel Iris Xe | Battery: 72Wh | Weight: 1.8kg

value.name: CreatorStudio 16
value.description: Ultimate creative workstation laptop with NVIDIA RTX graphics and color-accurate display for designers and content creators.
value.specs: Display: 16" 4K OLED | Processor: Intel Core i9-14900H | Memory: 32GB DDR5 | Storage: 1TB NVMe SSD | Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 4070 | Battery: 90Wh | Weight: 2.2kg

value.name: Galaxy Pro Max
value.description: Flagship smartphone with revolutionary AI camera system and all-day battery life.
value.specs: Display: 6.8" Dynamic AMOLED 2X | Processor: Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 | Memory: 12GB | Storage: 256GB | Camera: 200MP + 12MP + 10MP | Battery: 5000mAh | 5G

value.name: Pixel Ultra
value.description: Pure Android experience with Google AI and exceptional computational photography.
value.specs: Display: 6.7" LTPO OLED | Processor: Google Tensor G4 | Memory: 12GB | Storage: 128GB | Camera: 50MP + 48MP + 48MP | Battery: 5050mAh | 5G

value.name: ProPad Air
value.description: Versatile tablet for work and entertainment with desktop-class performance.
value.specs: Display: 11" Liquid Retina | Processor: M2 | Memory: 8GB | Storage: 256GB | Connectivity: WiFi 6E | Battery: 10 hours | Weight: 461g

value.name: SoundMax Pro
value.description: Premium wireless headphones with industry-leading noise cancellation and spatial audio.
value.specs: Driver: 40mm | Frequency: 4Hz-40kHz | ANC: Adaptive | Codec: LDAC, AAC, SBC | Battery: 40 hours (ANC on) | Weight: 250g

value.name: FitTrack Ultra
value.description: Advanced smartwatch with comprehensive health monitoring and fitness tracking.
value.specs: Display: 1.4" AMOLED | Processor: Exynos W930 | Storage: 16GB | Sensors: ECG, SpO2, HR, GPS | Battery: 40 hours | Water: 5ATM

value.name: CinemaView 65 OLED
value.description: Stunning 65-inch OLED TV with perfect blacks, infinite contrast, and cinematic Dolby Vision.
value.specs: Display: 65" 4K OLED | Refresh: 120Hz | HDR: Dolby Vision, HDR10 | Audio: Dolby Atmos | Smart: webOS 24 | Ports: 4x HDMI 2.1
